reviews.subject: Works great for chronic pain
reviews.review: Advil works great as a sleep aid for a chronic pain sufferer. If you are not in pain, don't use ibuprofen pm, but instead try just Benadryl.his stuff works great for falling asleep, but the drawback is being very tired when I wake up. Not everyone has this issue, but I do. Getting out of bed is extra hard, since after 8 hours ibuprofen stops working, so your pain comes back, and you might still be sleep. Use with caution and don't replace ibuprofen with this!

reviews.subject: Life Saver for switching to night shift
reviews.review: This stuff is a life saver for me when for a month a year I switch over to night shift. I just take 2 along with Zhou Drift Off, and I get much better rest, not perfect but I am not waking up 3 hours later wondering where I am. Worth it!

reviews.subject: Not work
reviews.review: I had two pills, but I could not fall asleep at all!

reviews.subject: Very good for ulcers in the mouth. Recommended
reviews.review: I was having an ulcer in my mouth, those that lasts for a week or two and my doctor gave me a prescription of Apo-Benzydamine Oral Rinse 15% and I can tell you the medicine was worse than the ulcer itself. After few months I got another ulcer and again I needed this medication. I went to the pharmacy and I was told I needed another prescription. Unfortunately it takes me at least 3 hours to go and see the doctor just to get the same prescription she gave me before. I asked if there was something similar and there I found Chloraseptic Sore Throat Spray, Cherry, 6-Ounce (177 ml) (Pack of 3) I did not need prescription for this one and the result was way better than with my previous medication. It numbs your mouth, mainly where you spray and the pain goes away for a while. Very good for ulcers in the mouth.

reviews.subject: Life Saver for switching to night shift
reviews.review: I searched for many days looking for the best value out there and couldn't find anything cheaper than at Amazon.com.. I bought the pack of 3. I absolutely love this product, it does calms your symptoms whenever you are getting the flu or when your throat hurts.

reviews.subject: Great except
reviews.review: Not bad product for temporary relief of a sore throat but viruses are just that and a generic is just as good.

reviews.subject: Works wonders
reviews.review: I didn't wake up through the night. The taste was okay and again, left a tingling sensation in my mouth. It started working quickly for me. My symptoms started coming back about 45 minutes before it was time to retake it. It worked great and did exactly as it said it would. The only thing I didn't like was the tingling sensation.

reviews.subject: Effective
reviews.review: Very strong taste but extremely effective

reviews.subject: Great cold relief
reviews.review: elps the nasty cold and nighttime cough just which I did not get constipated after using it . Maybe just my issue but it does happen. The plus side is I get a restful night sleep and cold is better in awakening.

drug_name: Mucinex FastMax - Severe Congestion and Cough

reviews.subject: Great for mucus
reviews.review: Super safe, all it does is thin mucus which is what I needed, because I was keeping my husband up snorting and trying to get that thick residual post nasal drainage up or down. With mucinex twice a day it is MUCH less of a problem to me.

reviews.subject: Worth every penny
reviews.review: Great cough syrup, loosens things up without a lot of coughing. Expensive, but worth every penny. I take this everyday by doctors order because of asthma. Drink plenty of water while taking this.

reviews.subject: Worked but it hurts
reviews.review: It cleared up my throat4 most of the way, but it made my chest hurt, made my eyes water so much they burned and made me feel out of breath... I think I will stick to Sudafed.

description: Thins & Loosens Mucus
Controls Cough
Relieves Chest Congestion

drug_name: SUDAFED PEÆ Pressure + Pain + Cough Liquid

reviews.subject: Great Product- works fast
reviews.review: This works great! Truly a life saver. My only issue is that it only lasts 4 hours. I can definitely tell when it's wearing off.

reviews.subject: Just Works
reviews.review: I have purchased Sudafed since it came on the market and was disappointed when it was placed behind the Pharmacy counter. I thought the product had been recalled since I could not find it. However, upon learning that I would have to go to the Pharmacy counter every time, I decided to order it. Ordering it was convenient and considerably less expensive than purchasing it in the store. It came within a couple of days and was exactly what I ordered.

reviews.subject: Great Product
reviews.review: I use this product pretty regularly. I had never had issues with my sinuses before but a few years ago I got a terrible sines infection and now my sinuses are always hurting. I always use Sudafed PE to help with the pain when it is particularly nasty, like today actually. This product works really well and I will continue to purchase it on a regular basis.

description: Temporarily relieves sinus & cold symptoms including nasal & sinus congestion and sinus pressure
Helps alleviate sore throat, coughing, sinus headache, and minor aches and pains

drug_name: Vicks Nyquil Severe Cold & Flu Nighttime

reviews.subject: Magical Elixir
reviews.review: Tastes great, Warms you up when sick and puts you to sleep. And when I say sleep, this stuff KNOCKS YOU OUT. For the duration of its effects you forget that you're even sick with flu, cold (rhino virus), or other similar yet manageable afflictions. This elixir is worth every penny, I love how it makes me feel and relieves my cold symptoms.

reviews.subject: Peaceful Sleep
reviews.review: When you have a cold, this stuff helps you sleep. It tastes kind of bad, but you will not care.

reviews.subject: Not so great
reviews.review: This Severe formula will get you to bed, but the symptoms will not reduce as much as you hope.

description: Suppresses cough
Drowsy formula gives you a full night of sleep

reviews.subject: Amazing for Chronic Pain
reviews.review: I have chronic pain and have trouble sleeping. This product helps with the pain and sleep. I wake up refreshed and not drowsy.

reviews.subject: A staple in my life
reviews.review: Using this to help me sleep when an ankle problem I have flares up. It serves both purposes; swelling reduction plus help with sleeping. Good product and price.

reviews.subject: Be Pain-Free and Sleep Well, Tonight!
reviews.review: A good medicine for night-time pain relief. The sleep inducer sometimes makes me groggy - eyed for a brief time, after waking up. Overall, a superb choice for pain relief, that helps one sleep at night.

description: For occasional sleeplessness associated with minor aches and pains
Aleve PM caplets help you fall asleep for a good nightís rest and wake up with less pain
